title: Survival of the Fittest: Do you have the will to survive?
description: A terrifying psychological thriller of one man's bent need to destroy others while desperately trying to grasp the last pieces of his own fracturing mind. Seen from both sides - the hunter and the hunted - how very different a tortured soul can develop or destroy. . .Gillian's world has been dark since childhood when she lost her eyesight on a tragic night. Fiercely independent and strong in faith, she moves confidently through her days with Garrett, her faithful seeing-eye dog. She has never felt like she has missed out on anything or that her blindness has in any way been a handicap, until she catches the attention of a madman.Alex travels a very thin line between who his co-workers think they know and who his victims actually see . . . and the line is getting blurry. In the depths of his blackened soul, he believes with every fiber of his being that the imperfect of the world, the defects, need to be culled from the herd. Since childhood he has accepted this mantle wholeheartedly and his sights have most recently set on Gillian.Like a cat toying with a mouse, Alex begins his game of terror, relishing her fear and drawing out his pleasure until the last moment when he can bestow his final judgement. In Alex's world, it's all about Survival of the Fittest.
author: C.L.  Clark
